about_the_game:
Unlocks R18 contents in Cyber Crush 2069.

This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. or may not be appropriate for
Viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Contents, General Mature Content.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You, as a ripperdoc (self-proclaimed), have started your new clinic in a corner of Little China. With your cyberware fixing skill, will it help you to impress the girl?
